Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Prairie
ShortDescription: Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Indiana, 43rd, King Drive, and 47th, due to construction near 47th/Prairie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to mechanical problems on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to an mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
